title: Kaizers Inst. Presents A Very Kaizer Christmas
description:
Ho ho ho, it's the Holidays (as of press time) and Kaizers Institution, YOUR friendly neighborhood Kaizers Orchestra fansite gives you a gift of the Magi in the form of "A Very Kaizer Christmas", a collection of Kaizers live recordings from 2008.

The collection spans from popular hits like "Maskineri", "Resistansen" and "BÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¸n fra helvete" to rarities like "Bris", "Den sjette sansen" and "Die Polizei". These songs come from many different sources with different bitrates and audio channels/levels, so the album will not run seamlessly like a "true" live album would. However, Kaizers Institution tried their best to make the songs transition well into one another and the end result is pretty good, all things considered. 

If you want to burn this collection on a CD, we advise you, due to the fact that the length of the entire collection is greater than what most normal CD-Rs have room for, to split the album into 2 CDs, ending the first CD with "Kontroll pÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¥ kontinentet" and starting the second with "Dr. Mowinckel". Album art, while not maximized for printable use is found in the same "package".

Kaizers Institution wish you all a very happy Holiday, whatever religious or ethnic affiliation you adhere to (unless you're a Zombie Nazi) so stay safe, drive safe, drink responsibly, spread your seed and all that, and for God's sake, help share the gift of love by SEEDING THIS FILE. Thank you and enjoy your holiday!
_________________
